scripts.ruby: cd ruby && coverage-tests create-tests --path ./configuration && yarn ruby:files
scripts.ruby:files: cd ruby/test/coverage/generic && for file in *.spec.js; do mv "$file" "${file/.spec.js/_spec.rb}"; done
scripts.python:run: cd python && pip3 install -r python_requirements.txt && APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=$(uuidgen) python3 -m pytest -v ./test/coverage/generic --rootdir=./test --junitxml=./coverage-test-report.xml
scripts.python:run:parallel: cd python && pip3 install -r python_requirements.txt && APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=$(uuidgen) python3 -m pytest -v -n 10 ./test/coverage/generic --rootdir=./test --junitxml=./coverage-test-report.xml
scripts.python:report:if: [ "$TEST_REPORT_SANDBOX" = "False" ] && npm run python:report:prod || npm run python:report:sandbox
